languages.text: "Единственный танец, которому ты можешь меня научить — горизонтальная пляска, которую ты станцуешь со вскрытым горлом, лежа на палубе".
"The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
languages.original_text: "Единственный танец, которому ты можешь меня научить — горизонтальная пляска, которую ты станцуешь со вскрытым горлом, лежа на палубе".

traits.locale_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
"The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
"The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
"The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
"The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

languages.text: "Ihr könnt mich nur einen Tanz lehren: Den, bei dem Ihr mit aufgeschlitzter Kehle zuckend auf dem liegt."
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt mich nur einen Tanz lehren: Den, bei dem Ihr mit aufgeschlitzter Kehle zuckend auf dem liegt."

languages.text: « La seule danse que vous puissiez m'apprendre, c'est celle où vous finissez face contre terre sur la passerelle, la gorge tranchée d'une oreille à l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

traits.locale_text: « La seule danse que vous puissiez m'apprendre, c'est celle où vous finissez face contre terre sur la passerelle, la gorge tranchée d'une oreille à l'autre. »

languages.text: «El único baile que puedes enseñarme termina contigo en el suelo, sangrando por la garganta».
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

traits.locale_text: «El único baile que puedes enseñarme termina contigo en el suelo, sangrando por la garganta».

languages.text: 「あなたが私に教えられる唯一のダンスは、喉を切り裂かれて甲板の上で痙攣しながら横たわるダンスね」
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが私に教えられる唯一のダンスは、喉を切り裂かれて甲板の上で痙攣しながら横たわるダンスね」

languages.text: “你唯一能教给我的舞蹈，就是你躺在甲板上，抽搐着，喉咙被割开时跳的舞蹈。”
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

traits.locale_text: “你唯一能教给我的舞蹈，就是你躺在甲板上，抽搐着，喉咙被割开时跳的舞蹈。”

languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."

languages.text: "Bana öğretebileceğin tek dans, boğazın kesik bir hâlde güvertede titreyerek uzandığın dans olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The only dance you can teach me is the one where you lie twitching on the deck with your throat slashed open."
